name: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website built with Next.js and FastAPI, featuring a chatbot assistant powered by LangGraph and RAG.
highlights: Implemented a conversational AI assistant using LangGraph for structured conversation flow
Created a RAG system to provide context-aware responses based on resume content
Built a responsive UI with Next.js and Tailwind CSS

name: E-commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce platform with product management, cart functionality, and payment processing.
highlights: Implemented secure user authentication and authorization
Integrated Stripe payment processing with webhook support
Built a responsive admin dashboard for product and order management

name: Task Management App
description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates and team features.
highlights: Implemented real-time updates using Firebase Firestore
Created a drag-and-drop interface for task organization
Built team collaboration features including comments and assignments

name: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts for multiple locations.
highlights: Integrated with OpenWeather API for accurate weather data
Created interactive charts for temperature and precipitation forecasts

name: Recipe Finder
description: A recipe search application that allows users to find recipes based on ingredients they have.
highlights: Built cross-platform mobile app using React Native
Implemented ingredient-based recipe search using Spoonacular API
Created favorite recipe storage with AsyncStorage
